trans-unit.source: Displays a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> in which a check box is displayed to the left of each item.
trans-unit.target: 显示一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" />，其中在每项的左边显示一个复选框。

trans-unit.source: This control presents a list of items that the user can navigate by using the keyboard or the scrollbar on the right side of the control.
trans-unit.target: 此控件显示的用户可以通过使用键盘或滚动条控件右侧导航的项的列表。

trans-unit.source: The user can place a check mark by one or more items and the checked items can be navigated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以通过将放入复选标记一个或多个项和已选中的项可以导航与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>。

trans-unit.source: To add objects to the list at run time, assign an array of object references with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要在运行时将对象添加到列表，分配的对象引用与数组<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The list then displays the default string value for each object.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该列表显示每个对象的默认字符串值。

trans-unit.source: You can add individual items to the list with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将各个项添加到该列表与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> object supports three states through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> enumeration: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState.Checked>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState.Indeterminate>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState.Unchecked>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>对象支持通过三种状态<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>枚举： <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState.Checked>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState.Indeterminate>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState.Unchecked>。

trans-unit.source: You must set the state of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState.Indeterminate> in the code because the user interface for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> does not provide a mechanism to do so.
trans-unit.target: 必须设置的状态的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState.Indeterminate>在代码中的用户界面因为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>不提供一种机制来这样做。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.UseTabStops%2A> is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> will recognize and expand tab characters in an item's text, creating columns.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.UseTabStops%2A>是`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>将识别并展开在项的文本中，创建列的制表符字符数。

trans-unit.source: These tab stops are preset and cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: 这些选项卡停止预设了并不能更改。

trans-unit.source: To use custom tab stops, set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.UseTabStops%2A> to `false`, set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.UseCustomTabOffsets%2A> to `true`, and add the custom values to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.CustomTabOffsets%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用自定义选项卡停止，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.UseTabStops%2A>到`false`，将其设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.UseCustomTabOffsets%2A>到`true`，并添加到自定义值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.CustomTabOffsets%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.UseCompatibleTextRendering%2A> property is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.CustomTabOffsets%2A> property will be ignored and replaced with standard tab offsets.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.UseCompatibleTextRendering%2A>属性是`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.CustomTabOffsets%2A>将忽略属性，并将其替换为标准的制表位偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> class supports the following three indexed collections:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>类支持以下三个索引的集合：

trans-unit.source: Collection
trans-unit.target: 集合

trans-unit.source: Encapsulating Class
trans-unit.target: 封装类

trans-unit.source: All items contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 中包含的所有项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: Checked items (including items in an indeterminate state), which is a subset of the items contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 已选中项 （包括处于不确定状态的项），该部分项目包含在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: Checked indexes, which is a subset of the indexes into the items collection.
trans-unit.target: 检查索引，它是项集合中的索引子集。

trans-unit.source: These indexes specify items in a checked or indeterminate state.
trans-unit.target: 这些索引在选中或不确定状态中指定项。

trans-unit.target: 项

trans-unit.target: 对象 1

trans-unit.target: 对象 4

trans-unit.target: 对象 5

trans-unit.source: The second table provides an example of the indexed collection of the checked items.
trans-unit.target: 第二个表提供了已选中项的索引集合的示例。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how you can use the methods, properties, and collections of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用方法、 属性和集合的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>。

trans-unit.source: This is a complete sample ready to run once you have copied it to your project.
trans-unit.target: 这是准备好运行一次，你已将它复制到你的项目的完整示例。

trans-unit.source: You can check and uncheck items, use the text box to add items and once you have clicked the save button, clear the checked items.
trans-unit.target: 可以检查和取消选中项、 使用文本框中添加项和您在一次单击保存按钮，清除已选中的项。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A> and the `ResizeRedraw` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> to specify that the control is redrawn when resized.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A>和`ResizeRedraw`值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>指定控件在调整大小时重绘。

trans-unit.source: Collection of checked indexes in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 该 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> 中选中索引的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection" /> collection for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of checked indexes is a subset of the indexes into the collection of all items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 选中的索引的集合是中的所有项的集合中的索引子集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: These indexes specify items in a checked or indeterminate state.
trans-unit.target: 这些索引在选中或不确定状态中指定项。

trans-unit.source: The following example enumerates the checked items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection> to see what check state an item is in.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例枚举中的已选中的项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>若要查看内容检查项的状态处于。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndices%2A> property to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItems%2A> property to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 该示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndices%2A>属性来获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItems%2A>属性来获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The first loop uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A> method to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> of each checked item, given the index of the item.
trans-unit.target: 第一个循环使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>方法以获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>的每个选中的项，给定项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The second loop also uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>, but uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to retrieve the index for the item.
trans-unit.target: 第二个循环也使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>，但使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来检索项的索引。

trans-unit.source: Collection of checked items in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 该 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> 中选中项的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection" /> collection for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection is a subset of the objects in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A> collection, representing only those items whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=nameWithType> is `Checked` or `Indeterminate`.
trans-unit.target: 集合是中的对象的子集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A>的项集合，表示只有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=nameWithType>是`Checked`或`Indeterminate`。

trans-unit.source: The indexes in this collection are in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 此集合中的索引都按升序。

trans-unit.source: The following example enumerates the checked items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection> to see what check state an item is in.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例枚举中的已选中的项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>若要查看内容检查项的状态处于。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndices%2A> property to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItems%2A> property to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 该示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndices%2A>属性来获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItems%2A>属性来获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The first loop uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A> method to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> of each checked item, given the index of the item.
trans-unit.target: 第一个循环使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>方法以获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>的每个选中的项，给定项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The second loop also uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>, but uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to retrieve the index for the item.
trans-unit.target: 第二个循环也使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>，但使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来检索项的索引。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请执行以下步骤：

trans-unit.source: Create a new Windows Forms application.
trans-unit.target: 创建新的 Windows 窗体应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> to the form.
trans-unit.target: 添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>到窗体。

trans-unit.source: Name the button `WhatIsChecked`, add a handler for its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event, and copy in the code from the body of the following handler.
trans-unit.target: 将该按钮命名`WhatIsChecked`，添加的处理程序其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件，并在以下处理程序的主体中的代码中的副本。

trans-unit.source: Add some items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 某些将项添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>。

trans-unit.source: Run the example and check some of the check boxes in the list box.
trans-unit.target: 运行示例，并检查某些列表框中的复选框。

trans-unit.source: Click the button.
trans-unit.target: 单击按钮。

trans-unit.source: You will see a series of message boxes that indicate which items were checked.
trans-unit.target: 你将看到一系列的消息框，指示签入的项。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the check box should be toggled when an item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当选定项时是否应切换复选框。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the check mark is applied immediately; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果立即应用选中标记，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckOnClick%2A> indicates whether the check box should be toggled whenever an item is selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckOnClick%2A> 指示是否应切换复选框，每当选择项。

trans-unit.source: The default behavior is to change the selection on the first click, and then have the user click again to apply the check mark.
trans-unit.target: 默认行为是更改在第一次单击，选择，然后再次单击以应用复选标记的用户。

trans-unit.source: In some instances, however, you might prefer have the item checked as soon as it is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，但是，你可能更喜欢具有项检查，只要单击它。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates initializing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> control by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckOnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SelectionMode%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ThreeDCheckBoxes%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckOnClick%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SelectionMode%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ThreeDCheckBoxes%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The example populates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> with controls and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DisplayMember%2A> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: 该示例填充<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>带控件和集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DisplayMember%2A>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>的控件属性。

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> named `CheckedListBox1` and call the `InitializeCheckListBox` method from the form's constructor or Load method.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴在窗体包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>名为`CheckedListBox1`并调用`InitializeCheckListBox`从窗体的构造函数或负载方法的方法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> 控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Click> event passes an <xref:System.EventArgs> to its event handler, so it only indicates that a click has occurred.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Click>事件传递<xref:System.EventArgs>给其事件处理程序中，因此它仅指示发生了单击操作。

trans-unit.source: If you need more specific mouse information (such as the button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> events, which pass a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs> to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要更具体的鼠标信息 （如按钮、 单击、 鼠标轮旋转或位置的数），使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>事件，将传递<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs>到事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: 由用户的操作系统的鼠标设置确定一次双击。

trans-unit.source: The user can adjust the amount of time that can pass between clicks during a double-click of a mouse button.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以调整可以传递期间双击鼠标按钮点击之间的时间量。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Click> event is raised every time the user double-clicks a control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Click>每次用户双击控件时引发事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have event-handling methods for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Click> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events of a form, the events are raised when the form is double-clicked and both event-handling methods are called.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你有的事件处理方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Click>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>事件的窗体中，双击窗体，这两个事件处理方法调用时引发事件。

trans-unit.source: If the user double-clicks a control that does not support the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> event, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Click> event might be raised twice.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户双击控件不支持<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>事件，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Click>事件，可能会引发两次。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> named `CheckedListBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>名为`CheckedListBox1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> 控件创建一个新的辅助功能对象。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" />。

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: 如果不显式调用 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> 方法，则在引用 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> 属性时将会调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 要获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>属性，必须添加对引用`Accessibility`随.NET Framework 一起安装的程序集。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A> property should not be overridden and used to adjust the properties of your derived control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A>属性不应重写，用于调整派生控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: Properties such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Caption%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Width%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Height%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> should be set by the corresponding properties in your control such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 属性，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Caption%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Width%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Height%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>应设置在控件中的相应属性如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams> should only be extended when you are wrapping a standard Windows control class or to set styles not provided by the Windows Forms namespace.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams>包装标准 Windows 控件类或设置样式不是由 Windows 窗体命名空间时才应扩展。

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating control parameters, see the `CreateWindow` and `CreateWindowEx` functions and the `CREATESTRUCT` structure documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: 有关创建控制参数的详细信息，请参阅`CreateWindow`和`CreateWindowEx`函数和`CREATESTRUCT`Windows 平台 SDK 参考中的结构文档位于 MSDN 库http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。

trans-unit.target: 表示数据来源的对象。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DataSource" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DataSource" /> 属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that specifies a property of the objects contained in the list box whose contents you want to display.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个字符串，该字符串指定要显示其内容的列表框中所含对象的属性。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies the name of a property of the objects contained in the list box.
trans-unit.target: 指定列表框中所含对象的属性名的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串("")。

trans-unit.source: By default the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> displays the default string for the items it contains.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>显示其包含的项的默认字符串。

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> can display diverse types of objects and you may want to change the displayed string by specifying the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DisplayMember%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 但是，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>可以显示不同类型的对象，并且你可能想要通过指定更改显示的字符串<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DisplayMember%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the specified property does not exist, or the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DisplayMember%2A> property is an empty string (""), the results of the object's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ToString%2A> method are displayed instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的属性不存在，或值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DisplayMember%2A>属性为空字符串 ("")，该对象的结果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ToString%2A>改为显示方法。

trans-unit.source: If the new value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DisplayMember%2A> cannot be set, the previous value is maintained.
trans-unit.target: 如果的新值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DisplayMember%2A>不能设置，维护以前的值。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckOnClick%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SelectionMode%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ThreeDCheckBoxes%2A>属性。

trans-unit.target: 该示例填充<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>带控件和集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DisplayMember%2A>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>的控件属性。

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> named `CheckedListBox1` and call the `InitializeCheckListBox` method from the form's constructor or Load method.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴在窗体包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>名为`CheckedListBox1`并调用`InitializeCheckListBox`从窗体的构造函数或负载方法的方法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DisplayMember" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DisplayMember" /> 属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a visual aspect of an owner-drawn <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> changes.
trans-unit.target: 在所有者绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> 的可视方位更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此事件与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: This event is used by an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此事件由一个所有者绘制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The event is raised only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode.OwnerDrawFixed?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，才<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawMode%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode.OwnerDrawFixed?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform the tasks needed to draw items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此事件来执行绘制项所需的任务<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>。

trans-unit.source: If you have a variable-sized item (that is, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable?displayProperty=nameWithType>), the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.MeasureItem> event is raised before the item is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 如果你拥有一个可变大小的项 (即，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawMode%2A>设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable?displayProperty=nameWithType>)，则<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.MeasureItem>绘制项之前，将引发事件。

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.MeasureItem> event to specify the size for the item that you are going to draw in your event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawItem> event.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建的事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.MeasureItem>事件，以指定要绘制事件处理程序中的项的大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawItem>事件。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此事件与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the mode for drawing elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> 的绘制元素的模式。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: Always a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode" /> of <see langword="Normal" />.
trans-unit.target: 通常为 <see langword="Normal" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: The index of the item.
trans-unit.target: 项的索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the specified item is checked.
trans-unit.target: 返回指示指定项是否选中的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the item is checked; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果选中该项，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemChecked%2A> returns `true` if the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> is `Checked` or `Indeterminate` for the item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemChecked%2A> 返回`true`如果的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>是`Checked`或`Indeterminate`项。

trans-unit.source: To determine the specific state the item is in, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定项处于特定状态，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> specified is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <paramref name="index" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> specified is greater than or equal to the count of items in the list.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <paramref name="index" /> 大于或等于列表中项的计数。

trans-unit.source: The index of the item to get the checked value of.
trans-unit.target: 要获取其选中值的项的索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating the check state of the current item.
trans-unit.target: 返回指示当前项的复选状态的值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A> method provides the ability to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> value of an item, given the index.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>方法能够获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>项，为索引提供了值。

trans-unit.source: If you never set the check state of an item to `Indeterminate`, then use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemChecked%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你永远不会设置一个项的复选状态`Indeterminate`，然后使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemChecked%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example enumerates the checked items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection> to see what check state an item is in.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例枚举中的已选中的项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>若要查看内容检查项的状态处于。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A> method to set the check state of an item.
trans-unit.target: 该示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>方法来设置项的复选状态。

trans-unit.source: The example also demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndices%2A> property to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItems%2A> property to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还演示了如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndices%2A>属性来获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItems%2A>属性来获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The first loop uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A> method to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> of each checked item, given the index of the item.
trans-unit.target: 第一个循环使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>方法以获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>的每个选中的项，给定项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The second loop also uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>, but uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to retrieve the index for the item.
trans-unit.target: 第二个循环也使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>，但使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来检索项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> specified is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <paramref name="index" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> specified is greater than or equal to the count of items in the list.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <paramref name="index" /> 大于或等于列表中项的计数。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the checked state of an item changes.
trans-unit.target: 当某项的选中状态更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The check state is not updated until after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ItemCheck> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 直到会被更新的复选状态后<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ItemCheck>事件发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ItemCheck> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ItemCheck>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> named `CheckedListBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>名为`CheckedListBox1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ItemCheck> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ItemCheck>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the item area.
trans-unit.target: 获取项区域的高度。

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the item area.
trans-unit.target: 项区域的高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: This measurement is based on the font height plus a small margin to provide white space around the item.
trans-unit.target: 此测量值基于字体高度加上一个小边距来提供项周围的空白区域。

trans-unit.source: The extenders of characters such as "g" and "y" do not display properly when the font is changed to 9.75-point Arial.
trans-unit.target: 当字体更改为 9.75 点 Arial"g"、"y"等字符的扩展部分不正确显示。

trans-unit.source: To correct this, derive a class from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> and override <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ItemHeight%2A> to return `base.ItemHeight+2`.
trans-unit.target: 若要纠正此问题，派生类从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>，并重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ItemHeight%2A>返回`base.ItemHeight+2`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of items in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取该 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> 中项的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection" /> collection representing the items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 代表 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection" /> 中的项的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A> property enables you to obtain a reference to the list of items that are currently stored in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A>属性使您能够获取对当前存储中的项列表的引用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: With this reference, you can add items, remove items, and obtain a count of the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 通过此引用，可以将项添加、 删除项，并获取集合中项的计数。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the tasks that can be performed with the item collection, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection> class reference topics.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用项集合执行的任务的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection>类参考主题。

trans-unit.source: The following example enumerates the checked items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection> to see what check state an item is in.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例枚举中的已选中的项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>若要查看内容检查项的状态处于。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A> property to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection> to retrieve the index of an item using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A>属性来获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection>要检索其索引的项使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The example also demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndices%2A> property to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItems%2A> property to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还演示了如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndices%2A>属性来获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItems%2A>属性来获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The first loop uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A> method to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> of each checked item, given the index of the item.
trans-unit.target: 第一个循环使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>方法以获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>的每个选中的项，给定项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The second loop also uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>, but uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to retrieve the index for the item.
trans-unit.target: 第二个循环也使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>，但使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来检索项的索引。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.OnClick%2A> method selects or clears the check box of the item that is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.OnClick%2A>方法选择或清除复选框单击的项。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckOnClick%2A> property is set to `true`, the check box is switched from a selected or cleared state the first time the item is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckOnClick%2A>属性设置为`true`，复选框切换从单击项的选中或清除状态第一个时间。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the check box is switched only if the item is already selected.
trans-unit.target: 否则，仅当已选定了项，则会切换复选框。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SelectionMode%2A> property determines whether one item in the list box can be selected or no items can be selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SelectionMode%2A>属性确定是否可以选择列表框中的一项或可以选择任何项。

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> objects, multiple selection is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 有关<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>不支持多个选择的对象。

trans-unit.source: You can set the mode to one item or no items.
trans-unit.target: 可以将模式设置为一项或没有任何项。

trans-unit.source: Sets <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState" /> for the item at the specified index to <see langword="Checked" />.
trans-unit.target: 将指定索引处的项的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState" /> 设置为 <see langword="Checked" />。

trans-unit.source: When a value of `true` is passed, this method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> value to `Checked`.
trans-unit.target: 值时`true`传递时，此方法设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>值赋给`Checked`。

trans-unit.source: A value of `false` sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> to `Unchecked`.
trans-unit.target: 值为`false`设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>到`Unchecked`。

trans-unit.source: The following example enumerates the items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> and checks every other item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例枚举中的项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>并检查列表中的每个其他项。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemCheckState%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemChecked%2A> methods to set the check state of an item.
trans-unit.target: 该示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemCheckState%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemChecked%2A>方法来设置项的复选状态。

trans-unit.source: For every other item that is to be checked, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemCheckState%2A> is called to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> to `Indeterminate`, while <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemChecked%2A> is called on the other item to set the checked state to `Checked`.
trans-unit.target: 要检查的每个其他项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemCheckState%2A>调用来设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>到`Indeterminate`，虽然<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemChecked%2A>上要设置为选中的状态的其他项调用`Checked`。

trans-unit.source: The example also demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A> property to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection> to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Count%2A> of items.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还演示了如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A>属性来获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection>获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Count%2A>的项。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.target: 要为其设置状态的项的索引。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Sets the check state of the item at the specified index.

trans-unit.target: 该示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemCheckState%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemChecked%2A>方法来设置项的复选状态。

trans-unit.source: For every other item that is to be checked, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemCheckState%2A> is called to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> to `Indeterminate`, while <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemChecked%2A> is called on the other item to set the checked state to `Checked`.
trans-unit.target: 要检查的每个其他项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemCheckState%2A>调用来设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>到`Indeterminate`，虽然<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemChecked%2A>上要设置为选中的状态的其他项调用`Checked`。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckOnClick%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SelectionMode%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ThreeDCheckBoxes%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to use the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) or the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer" /> class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) to render text.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定是使用 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 类 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) 还是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer" /> 类 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) 呈现文本。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> class should be used to perform text rendering for compatibility with versions 1.0 and 1.1.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />应使用类来执行兼容版本 1.0 和 1.1 文本呈现。

trans-unit.source: of the .NET Framework; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 中;否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property is intended to provide visual compatibility between Windows Forms controls that render text using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> class and [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] applications that perform custom text rendering using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class.
trans-unit.target: `UseCompatibleTextRendering`属性旨在提供 visual Windows 窗体控件之间的兼容性，呈现文本使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>类和[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]应用程序执行自定义文本呈现使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>类。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, if your application is not being upgraded from [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], it is recommended that you leave `UseCompatibleTextRendering` set to the default value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，如果你的应用程序不正在升级从[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]，因此，建议你停`UseCompatibleTextRendering`设置的默认值为`false`。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] based <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> class was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] to improve performance, make text look better, and improve support for international fonts.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]基于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>类中引入了[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]为了提高性能，使文本效果更好，并提高的国际字体支持。

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] based <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class was used to perform all text rendering.
trans-unit.target: 在早期版本的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]基于<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>类用于执行所有文本呈现。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] calculates character spacing and word wrapping differently from [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 计算字符间距和自动换行从的不同[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: In a Windows Forms application that uses the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class to render text, this could cause the text for controls that use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> to appear different from the other text in the application.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows 窗体应用程序中使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>类呈现文本中，这可能会导致使用的控件的文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>显示不同于应用程序中的其他文本。

trans-unit.source: To resolve this incompatibility, you can set the `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property to `true` for a specific control.
trans-unit.target: 若要解决此不兼容性，你可以设置`UseCompatibleTextRendering`属性`true`对特定的控件。

trans-unit.source: To set `UseCompatibleTextRendering` to `true` for all supported controls in the application, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method with a parameter of `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置`UseCompatibleTextRendering`到`true`应用程序中的所有受支持控件，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法的参数替换`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that specifies the property of the data source from which to draw the value.
